text: Hey Emma, sorry haven’t been in touch for a while, I’ve been quite busy, just thought I’ll give you a little update on what I’ve been up to. So I’ve finished all my character designs for my different ideas and have decided to go with the dragon idea, I’ll sent you pictures of the designs just to get your opinion, I’ve also been wiki g on my final essay which my research deadline is on the 21 of August, I will get my new draft sorted as soon as possible and email it to you
